answer: Yes and yes. Nothing stops the Runner from jacking out at unusual times if given the opportunity by a card ability. Jacking out ends the run, which ends any breach in progress as well.
question: If [Karunā](/en/card/30047)’s first subroutine resolves while the Runner is already breaching the attacked server (perhaps because of [Ganked!](/en/card/26119)), can the Runner still jack out? Does that stop them from accessing any more cards?
